channel.title: Source Mods - Display map name?
channel.description:
Hey, buddies.
I am wondering: is there a way to always show the map name on the screen while playing a Source mod? I know you can briefly have the map name and other information, such as location coordinates, on the screen using the "status" console command, but that disappears after a short time.
I was wondering if there was a way to have that "status" information on the screen constantly. Thanks!

item.title: Source Mods - Display map name?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Great, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Mods - Display map name?
item.dc:creator: ntgd
item.description:
cl_showfps 1 will display the map name

Read full topic
